Queries: create table customer_contact (customer_contact_key numeric(38,0) not null, email varchar(16), full_name varchar(16) not null, phone varchar(16), sub varchar(36), primary key (customer_contact_key))

create table order_address (address_key numeric(38,0) not null, country varchar(3) not null, city varchar(16) not null, state varchar(16) not null, addressline1 varchar(64) not null, addressline2 varchar(64) not null, primary key (address_key))

create table order_data (address_key numeric(38,0) unique, customer_contact_key numeric(38,0) unique, order_key numeric(38,0) not null, order_status_key numeric(38,0) unique, order_date timestamp(6), entity varchar(40) not null, order_no varchar(40) not null, primary key (order_key), unique (order_no))

create table order_item_data (lineno integer not null, order_item_key numeric(38,0) not null, order_key numeric(38,0), qty integer not null, status integer not null, sku varchar(40) not null, price float(10) not null, tax_code varchar(5) not null, desc varchar(80) not null, primary key (order_item_key))
create table order_status (order_key numeric(38,0) not null, order_status_key numeric(38,0) not null, status integer not null, primary key (order_status_key), unique (order_key))

create table service_error (error_key numeric(38,0) not null, date timestamp(6) not null, error_message varchar(512) not null, input varchar(2048) not null, stack_trace varchar(2048) not null, function_name varchar(255) not null, service varchar(255) not null, primary key (error_key))

create table service_statistic (average float(53) not null, count float(53) not null, max float(53) not null, min float(53) not null, stats_key numeric(38,0) not null, from_time timestamp(6) not null, to_time timestamp(6) not null, function_name varchar(255) not null, service varchar(255) not null, primary key (stats_key))
alter table if exists order_data add constraint FKkfmtp36ftk6hsokkjjgaepl9c foreign key (address_key) references order_address
alter table if exists order_data add constraint FKtlh48876bvadpvag1v8t4behs foreign key (customer_contact_key) references customer_contact
alter table if exists order_data add constraint FK8raoe6buk4hcobq83txbolctc foreign key (order_status_key) references order_status
alter table if exists order_item_data add constraint FK3jqsy8agib6r78jqqn9s34yq1 foreign key (order_key) references order_data
